com.oracle.truffle.api.object

Class Layout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Layout
  • Deprecated. 
    since 21.1. Use Shape.Builder instead.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class Layout
extends Object
    Describes layout and behavior of a DynamicObject subclass and is used to create shapes. An object may change its shape but only to shapes of the same layout. NB: Instances of this class should be created only in static initializers. Planned to be deprecated.
    Since:
    0.8 or earlier
